self.title: CDISC CDASH Unit for Duration of Treatment Interruption Terminology

definition: A terminology subset of the CDISC SDTM Unit codelist created for CDASH Unit for Duration of Treatment Interruption codelist. (NCI)
name: Unit for the Duration of Treatment Interruption
preferredTerm: CDISC CDASH Unit for Duration of Treatment Interruption Terminology
synonyms: Unit for the Duration of Treatment Interruption

terms.definition: A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day. (NCI)
A unit measure of time equal to 60 seconds.(NCI)

The second is a unit of time with a duration of 919 263 177 0 periods of the specified light radiation corresponding to the transition between the two hyperfine levels of the cesium 133 atom in its ground state at 0 K. According to the convention, 60 seconds constitute one minute; 3,600 seconds constitute one hour. Abbreviation Sec. is acceptable in non-scientific usage only.(NCI)
